fields.name: Passive:
fields.value: **May use up to two abilities per night, excluding Craftsmanship**

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Craftsmanship (Day): Select a player, you will immediately copy their role for the night. Takes effect instantly.
Master of All (Night): Kill a player at night, disguise the players death as your selected role. You may also use your town abilities.
